Incorporate: Prior knowledge (CI/CD, Docker, Kubernetes). Voter priorities (pedagogy progression, completeness on integrations). Formative assessments as example cards. Output ONLY 20-30 flashcards in JSON array: [{'front': '...', 'back': {'answer': '...', 'explanation': '...', 'bloom_level': '...', 'layer': '...', 'distractors_used': '...'}}, ...].
